text: Ūst, ki ʙoronro meʙoronad va az on ci dar ʙacadoni zanhoi homila ast, medonad. Va heç kas namedonad, ki fardo ci ciz ʙa dast xohad ovard va kase namedonad, ki dar kadom sarzamin memirad, ʙalki donistani in umur az xususijati Alloh ast. Haroina, Alloh donovu ogoh ast va cize az Ū pinhon namemonad
